definitions.text: group of guns or missile launchers operated together at one place
a device that produces electricity; may have several primary or secondary cells arranged in parallel or series
a collection of related things intended for use together
examples: took a battery of achievement tests

definitions.text: a unit composed of the pitcher and catcher
a series of stamps operated in one mortar for crushing ores
the heavy fire of artillery to saturate an area rather than hit a specific target
examples: they laid down a barrage in front of the advancing troops
the shelling went on for hours without pausing

definitions.text: an assault in which the assailant makes physical contact
